Hero.title: Welcome to Wildscope!
Hero.subtitle: Your ultimate adventure companion. Discover, explore, and share.

About.title: What Is Wildscope?
About.paragraph1: Wildscope is your interactive companion for discovering nature. Whether you're hiking in the woods, walking your dog through a city park, or exploring the Amazon from your couch, Wildscope helps you connect with the environment in new, meaningful ways.
About.paragraph2: From casual walks to adventurous journeys, Wildscope offers a unique blend of AI technology, offline exploration tools, and a global community of nature lovers.

Features.title: Amazing Features
Features.feature1_desc: Navigate with confidence using our custom waypoint compass, decode signals with the built-in Morse tool, and access the comprehensive Kntos-library—everything you need for adventure, all in one place.
Features.feature2_desc: Discover Flora, Fauna, and Fungi in your surroundings with our advanced tracking system. Log your wildlife sightings, access detailed species information including location-specific data, high-quality images, interactive habitat maps, and contribute to citizen science projects worldwide.
Features.feature3_desc: Join a vibrant community of nature lovers and explorers. Find exciting discoveries from fellow adventurers, visit their marked locations, like and comment on their findings, or share your own unique experiences to inspire others.
Features.feature4_desc: Discover nature in your current location or explore distant biomes and ecosystems from home. Once an area is loaded, species data and detailed maps work completely offline, helping you navigate even without internet access—perfect for remote adventures.
Features.feature5_desc: Make learning enjoyable with our collection of basic nature quizzes and dynamically generated ones using local data. Test your survival skills through immersive text adventures in pregenerated scenarios, or unleash your creativity by designing your own wilderness challenges.
Features.feature6_desc: Chat with your AI-powered companion who understands your surroundings. Share images for instant identification, ask questions about nearby species and landmarks, and receive personalized guidance for your outdoor adventures—it's like having a naturalist expert in your pocket.

CallToAction.title: Ready to Start Your Adventure?
CallToAction.subtitle: Download Wildscope and start exploring — whether you're deep in nature or on your living room couch.

Personal data is all data that can be used to identify you personally. For detailed information on data protection, please refer to our privacy policy listed below.

PrivacyPage.how_we_collect_text1: On the one hand, your data is collected when you provide it to us. This may be, for example, data that you enter in a contact form.
PrivacyPage.how_we_collect_text2: Other data is collected automatically or with your consent when you visit the website by our IT systems. PrivacyPage.data_protection_text2: When you use this website, various personal data is collected. Personal data is data that can be used to identify you personally. This privacy policy explains what data we collect and what we use it for. It also explains how and for what purpose this happens.

FAQ.title: Frequently Asked Questions
FAQ.question1: How is Wildscope different from iNaturalist?
FAQ.answer1: While iNaturalist focuses primarily on species identification and citizen science, Wildscope offers a more comprehensive outdoors experience with additional features like navigation tools, offline capabilities, text adventures, and quizzes. Wildscope also includes a built-in AI companion that understands your surroundings and can provide personalized guidance, making it suitable for both casual nature enthusiasts and serious adventurers.
FAQ.answer2: Yes! Once you've loaded an area, Wildscope's species data and detailed maps work completely offline. This is perfect for remote adventures where internet connectivity is limited or nonexistent.
FAQ.question3: What platforms is Wildscope available on?
FAQ.answer3: Wildscope is available for both iOS (iPhone/iPad) and Android devices through the App Store and Google Play Store.
FAQ.answer4: Wildscope offers a free version with core features and a premium subscription that unlocks advanced features. Check the app for current pricing details.
FAQ.question5: How accurate is the species identification?
FAQ.answer5: Wildscope uses location data combined with current AI technology to detect species, but it's important to note that AI can make errors. While we strive for accuracy, there can always be misidentifications. We continuously work to improve the system over time through updates and refinements to our algorithms.
FAQ.question6: Can I contribute to Wildscope's database?
FAQ.answer6: Absolutely! Wildscope is built with community input in mind. Your wildlife sightings and observations are combined with our existing community data to enhance the app experience for everyone. This shared knowledge creates a richer database that benefits all Wildscope users.
FAQ.question7: Is Wildscope developed by a company?
FAQ.answer7: No, Wildscope is a one-man hobby project. It's developed and maintained by a single passionate developer in their spare time. This means updates might take longer, but it also ensures that the app stays true to its original vision of being a simple, efficient tool for wildlife enthusiasts without corporate influence or pressure to monetize user data.
